content: ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ **special offer alert add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price don t miss this sale ** ❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️ sparrow crochet sweater - rustic elegance with easy-to-follow pattern this pattern is included in the just two seams collection whether you re new to crochet or a seasoned enthusiast this pattern is crafted with simplicity and style in mind **features ** **easy and trendy ** this crochet sweater pattern is designed for both fashion and ease of creation with basic stitches and clear instructions it s perfect for beginners seeking a new and exciting project **worked flat ** craft each section of the sweater easily as you work flat allowing for clear visualization and simple construction **seamed construction ** seam down the arms and sides for a polished finish it s only 2 seams **ribbed detailing ** adorned with easy ribbing around the neck arms and bottom this sweater has lots of texture and charm **guided diagrams ** each pattern section is accompanied by detailed diagrams ensuring clarity and precision throughout creation **video tutorial ** need additional guidance our comprehensive video tutorial provides step-by-step instructions for a seamless crochet experience stitch charts are included in the pattern as a visual guide **size-inclusive from xs-5x** **materials needed ** yarn wecrochet heatherly sport 1 900 1100 1200 1400 1600 1750 1900 2050 2200 yards crochet hook 2 4mm tapestry needle 3 stitch markers 4 scissors 5 **level beginner** **pattern includes ** written instructions guided diagrams video tutorial stitch charts cheers -
